meta.name: Mrs. Socks
meta.about: Hello everyone :) Mrs. Socks is a mother of two boys/ an Educator/ Drama Practitioner/ Psychodrama Psychotherapist. She is nurturing the love of reading for children, sharing ideas about language learning, education and parenting. There are also Facebook page, Facebook group and Instagram page of Mrs. Socks in the links. There would be stories sharing, books recommendations for young readers with different age groups, extended activities suggestions for reading. Learning by doing, Mrs. Socks hope to grow with all fellow parents while seeing children enjoying learning!
